reviewText:
Producer's Notes:
For many teenagers, violence has become a fact of everyday life both at school and in the community. Some are harassed or bullied, while others fall victim to rape or hate crimes. This penetrating video classifies the types of youth violence and suggests preventive measures to help break the cycle of anguish and retaliation. A Cambridge Educational Production. (33 minutes, color, copyright date: 1999)

Part of the Series : Conflict Resolution: Breaking the Barriers of Violence

Awards and Honors: Crystal Award of Excellence, The Communicator Award; recommended by School Library Journal.
